channel.title: general on Chris Colvin
channel.description: Recent content in general on Chris Colvin

item.title: Baby's First Blog Post
item.description: What’s going on here? I write about my interests. As of right now, that is really about the gist of it! I’ve wanted to start a blog for a long time. However, I never really thought I had anything worth sharing. And, honestly, not much has changed. One thing that has changed, though, is my perspective no whether or not that matters. Turns out, it doesn’t. But something does… I have a confession: I hated writing papers in high-school.
